H1.text: who was executed for being an american spy during the revolutionary war. John André

H3.text: who was executed for being an american spy during the revolutionary war. Nathan Hale

A4.text: John André was captured, convicted of espionage by the Continental Army, and executed by hanging on George Washington's orders.

A5.text: Nathan Hale was captured and executed by the British, not by the Continental Army.
